ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid

dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma

dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan

lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa

bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu

'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la

yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang /

mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par

'gyur ro// 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa

pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro

phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha

tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang /

rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar

gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi

dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang /

mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab

kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag

las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i

byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /

po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin

thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rigs pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad

stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong

'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs

pa/ bam po gsum pa// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam

par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /

pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin

'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs

phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa

pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i

spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong

pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong

pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /

dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /

bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma

pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams

pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing

du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par

'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i

spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha tu

pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /

chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /

chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag

par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi

dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par

shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas

kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse bdag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi

pha rol tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la/ yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de

yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po

gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang /

tshul khrims kyi pha tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha tu pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid

dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong

pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad

pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam

bar thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /

'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /

rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la sbyong cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa

pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge

ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa pa dang /

mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang /

mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par

'gyur ro/ pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha tu pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi

stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma

pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i

lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /

'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des

na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir

bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag/ chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma

gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad

las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas

sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha tu pa dang / bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas

stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang

pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga

dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs

rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing /

dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam
par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs

pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol

tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha tu pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid

dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba

pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags

pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar ba'i

sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so

yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul

gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la

yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang /

mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par

'gyur ro// 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang /

rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs

pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan te// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu ba bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub

sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes

rab kyi pha tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang /

dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang /

byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad

dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams

cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te

skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod na de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa

de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa pa dang mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa

dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bco lnga'o//
// shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi pa// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya phyin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis de ltar chos kyi char pa

'di phab ste/ bstan na de la bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ me tog mngon par sprul pa bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la gtor bar bya'o// mngon par gtor bar bya'o// rab tu gtor bar bya'o// snyam mo// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal

chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun

'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i

lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og gyi lha ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang 'di

snyam du sems par gyur te/ de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi char pa 'di phab ste/ bstan na de la bdag cag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ tog mngon par sprul pa bya ste/ sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la gtor bar bya'o// mngon par gtor bar bya'o// rab tu gtor bar bya'o snyam mo//

de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul

dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang /

dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong

ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og gyi lha de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi me tog man+dA ra ba mang po mngon par sprul te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'thor bar gyur to// mngon par 'thor bar gyur to// rab tu 'thor bar gyur to// me tog de dag gis gtor ma thag tu stong

gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhi me tog gis khebs par gyur nas/ steng gi bar snang la yang me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba kun

nas gnas par gyur to// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni bdag gis sngon chad lha'i gnas thams cad na yang yod par ma mthong ste/ me tog

'di dag ni sprul pa'o// 'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma yin/ chu las skyes pa ma yin/ thang las skyes pa ma yin no// 'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di

dag ni yid las byung ba ste/ me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma byung ba ste/ me tog 'di dag ni

yid las byung ba ma yin no// ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de skad du me tog 'di dag ma skyes pa ste me tog 'di dag yid las byung ba ma yin/ ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni/ kau shi ka de ltar ma

skyes pa ni me tog kyang ma yin no// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma byung bar zad dam/ 'o ma tam gzugs kyang ma byung / tshor ba yang ma byung / 'du shes kyang ma byung / 'du byed kyang ma byung / rnam par

shes pa yang ma byung ba yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka me tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma byung bar ma zad kyi/ kau shi ka gzugs kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs ma yin no// kau shi ka tshor ba yang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma

byung ba de ni tshor ba ma yin no// kau shi ka 'du shes kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'du shes ma yin no// kau shi ka 'du byed kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'du byed ma yin no// kau shi ka rnam par shes pa yang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma

byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// kau shi ka ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ma yin no// kau shi ka rna ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba ma yin no// kau shi ka sna ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sna ma yin no//

kau shi ka lce ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce ma yin no// kau shi ka lus ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lus ma yin no// kau shi ka yid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yid ma yin no// kau shi ka gzugs ni ma byung ba ste/

gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs ma yin no// kau shi ka sgra ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sgra ma yin no// kau shi ka dri ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dri ma yin no// kau shi ka ro ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ro ma yin

no// kau shi ka reg ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni reg ma yin no// kau shi ka chos ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni chos ma yin no// kau shi ka gi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin

no// kau shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// kau shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// kau shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa

ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// kau shi ka lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// kau shi ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung

ba de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// kau shi ka gi 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg

pa ma yin no// kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// kau shi ka lus kyi

'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// kau shi ka gi 'dus te reg pa las

byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma

yin no// kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i

'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma

byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// kau shi ka sa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sa'i khams ma yin no// kau shi ka chu'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni chu'i khams ma yin no//

kau shi ka khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni khams ma yin no// kau shi ka rlung gi khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rlung gi khams ma yin no// kau shi ka nam mkha'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni nam mkha'i

khams ma yin no// kau shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// kau shi ka ma rig pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ma rig pa ma yin no// kau shi ka 'du byed ni ma byung ba ste/

gang ma byung ba de ni 'du byed ma yin no// kau shi ka rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// kau shi ka dang gzugs ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dang gzugs ma yin no// kau shi ka skye mched

drug ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni skye mched drug ma yin no// kau shi ka reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni reg pa ma yin no// kau shi ka tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni tshor ba ma yin no// kau shi ka

sred pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sred pa ma yin no// kau shi ka len pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni len pa ma yin no// kau shi ka srid pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni srid pa ma yin no// kau shi ka skye ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang

ma byung ba de ni skye ba ma yin no// kau shi ka rga shi ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rga shi ma yin no// kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// kau shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// kau shi ka shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// kau shi ka nang stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni phyi

stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka chen po stong pa

nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'dus

byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma

yin no// kau shi ka thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi

ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba

ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni

dngos po pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka yang dag par spong ba rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma

yin no// kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka dbang po rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dbang po rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka stobs

rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni stobs rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ma byung ba ste/

gang ma byung ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// kau shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka bsam gtan rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba

de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka tshad pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni tshad pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka rnam par thar ba brgyad ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par thar ba brgyad ma yin no// kau shi ka mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no// kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ma yin no//

kau shi ka mngon par shes pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ma byung ba

ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka 'jigs pa bzhi ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni

'jigs pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka byams pa chen po ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni byams pa chen po ma yin no//

kau shi ka snying rje chen po ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni snying rje chen po ma yin no// kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa'i

'bras bu ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no// kau shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no// kau shi ka phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni

ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no// kau shi ka dgra bcom pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka rang byang chub ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rang byang chub ma

yin no// kau shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no//

kau shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa ma yin no// kau shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma yin no// kau shi ka phyir 'ong ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma

byung ba de ni phyir 'ong ba ma yin no// kau shi ka dgra bcom pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dgra bcom pa ma yin no// kau shi ka rang sangs rgyas ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rang sangs rgyas ma yin no// kau shi

ka byang chub sems dpa' ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no// kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam

du sems par gyur te/ kye ma gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de ltar btags pa dang yang 'gal la/ chos nyid kyang ston pa ni shes rab zab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no//

kau shi ka de de bzhin te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa ste/ de ltar btags pa dang yang 'gal la/ chos nyid kyang ston to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//

bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di btags pa dang yang 'gal la/ chos nyid kyang ston pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi

ka gzugs ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de

ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka 'du shes ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka 'du byed ni btags

pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor
gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'gal/ rnam par mi 'gal lo// gang 'gal/ rnam par 'gal ba de/ gnas brtan rab kyi sa

bstan te/ 'gal ba med do// kau shi ka ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka rna ba ni btags pa tsam mo// btags
pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka sna ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab

'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka lce ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka lus ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa

tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka yid ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar

bstan to// kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'gal rnam par 'gal lo// gang 'gal rnam par 'gal ba de gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba do// kau shi ka gzugs
ni btags pa tsam mo/ btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka sgra ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid

de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka dri ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis mi 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka ro ni btags pa tsam

mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka reg ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis

'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka chos ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin

pa de ni 'gal rnam par 'gal lo// gang 'gal rnam par 'gal ba de gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba do// kau shi ka gi rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos

nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to//

kau shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa

tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal

bar bstan to// kau shi ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang
yin pa de ni 'gal rnam par 'gal lo// gang 'gal rnam par 'gal ba de/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba do// kau shi ka gi 'dus te reg pa ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de

ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar

bstan to// kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni btags pa tsam mo//

btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan

rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos
rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'gal rnam par 'gal lo// gang 'gal rnam par 'gal ba de/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba do// kau shi ka gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba

ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa

de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal

bar bstan to// kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

kyis tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa

tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'gal rnam par 'gal lo// gang 'gal rnam par 'gal ba
de/ gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis bstan te 'gal ba do// kau shi ka sa'i khams ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to//

kau shi ka chu'i khams ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka khams ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid

mthong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa la slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i gi 'dus te reg pa de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rna ba'i 'dus te

reg pa de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa la slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa la slob ste/
