ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka dor ba pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/

'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka dngos po pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka ngo bo nyid stong

pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka dngos po

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus

so// kau shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus

so// kau shi ka yang dag par spong ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtha' dang

dbus so// kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams

kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka dbang po mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams kyi mtha'

dang dbus so// kau shi ka stobs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus

so// kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus

so// kau shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i

lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka

de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka bsam gtan mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka tshad pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshad pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka rnam par thar pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mtha' yas pa'i

phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa

nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid

dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka mngon par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de

ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka gzungs kyi sgo mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de

ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas

pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po'i mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid mtha'

yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka

lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus

so// kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

kyi mtha' dang dbus so// kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / 'du shes mtha' yas pa dang / 'du

byed mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba mtha' yas pa dang / sna mtha' yas pa dang / lce mtha' yas pa dang / lus mtha' yas pa dang / yid mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs mtha' yas

pa dang / sgra mtha' yas pa dang / dri mtha' yas pa dang / ro mtha' yas pa dang / reg mtha' yas pa dang / chos mtha' yas ba dang / gi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i rnam

par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te

reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te

reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sa'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / chu'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / khams mtha' yas pa dang / rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa dang / nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par

shes pa'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / ma rig pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'du byed mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / dang gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / skye mched drug mtha' yas pa dang / reg pa mtha' yas pa dang /

tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sred pa mtha' yas pa dang / len pa mtha' yas pa dang / srid pa mtha' yas pa dang / skye ba mtha' yas pa dang / rga shi mtha' yas pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang /

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa

dang / nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa

dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid

mtha' yas pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas

pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mtha' yas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtha'

yas pa dang / dbang po rnams mtha' yas pa dang / stobs rnams mtha' yas pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtha' yas pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang /

bsam gtan rnams mtha' yas pa dang / tshad pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mtha' yas pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

dgu mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa mtha' yas pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mtha' yas pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtha'

yas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtha' yas pa dang / 'jigs pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang / byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa dang / snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa

dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad mtha' yas pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mtha'

yas pa dang / rang byang chub mtha' yas pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka gzhan yang

pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brgya byin kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na pa

mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya// rab kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka gzhan yang chos pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na chos pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya// rab kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid dang pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya// rab kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir pa mtha' yas

so// pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid mtha' yas so// kau shi ka de bzhin nyid dang pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so// kau shi

ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin zhes bya// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba de chos gang gi tshig yin//

brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni chos kyi tshig kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'i tshig kyang me yin te/ 'di ltar sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa/ dngos po par du btags

pa/ pa par ming du btags pa'o// rab kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las sems can du bshad pa gang yang yod dam// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni do/

rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gang la sems can du bshad pa gang yang pa de la/ sems can mtha' yas pa yod de/ kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye

ma snyed du bzhugs te/ sems can sems can zhes gsung du brjod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ de la sems can gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag par gyur pa yod dam// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma

nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de ltar rnam grangs des na/ sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang

tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skyes pa dang bud du bcas pa dag gis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de gang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i don du de

bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bshad cing brjod de/ bstan pa'i chos 'di ni kye ma legs par bshad do// kye ma chos 'di legs par bshad do// kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni legs par bshad do// bcom ldan

'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o// chos gang yang su ma mchis te/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/
'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ gi rnam par shes pa 'am

rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus

te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams

sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa'am/ tshor ba'am/ sred pa'am/ len pa'am/ srid pa'am/ skye ba'am/ rga shi'am/ sbyin pa'i pha du pa'am/ tshul

khrims kyi pha tu pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong

pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor

ba pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/

'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad pa rnams sam/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar

pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang

dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra

bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub 'am/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang su ma mchis kyis kyang theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa mchis te/

gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu dbang po dang bcas pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin
no/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// chos gang yang su de/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/

gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ gi rnam par shes pa'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa

'am/ gi 'dus te reg pa 'am// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te

reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i

khams sam/ khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba

'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol

tu pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus

ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ pa

stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po
rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad pa rnams sam/ gzugs pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting

nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang mod kyi/ theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa yang yod de/ gsum gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa dang / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o//

lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bshad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du

yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// brtson 'grus kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa

so// nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// phyi stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// phyi nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// stong pa nyid

stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// chen po stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// don dam pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// 'dus byas stong
pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so//

thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi

so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs

pa so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de
bzhin gshegs pa so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// dbang po rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// stobs rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gzhan
du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// bsam
gtan rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// tshad pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa
so// rnam par thar pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// rnam par

thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// mngon par shes pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// ting nge 'dzin rnams las gzhan
du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so//
'jigs pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// byams pa chen po las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so//

snying rje chen po las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// thams cad shes pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa
so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// // shes rab kyi pha tu
pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa// lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos 'di dag thams cad la slob ste/ sbyin pa'i pha tu pa la slob bo// tshul khrims kyi pha tu

pa la slob bo// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// nang stong pa nyid la slob bo// phyi stong pa nyid la

slob bo// phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob bo// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo// don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob bo// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob bo// mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// dor ba pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob bo// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob bo// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo//

pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// dngos po pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob bo// yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob bo//

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob bo// dbang po rnams la slob bo// stobs rnams la slob bo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob bo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob bo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob bo//

bsam gtan rnams la slob bo// tshad pa rnams la slob bo// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo// rnam par thar pa rnams la slob bo// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo//

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la slob bo// mngon par shes pa rnams la slob bo// ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob bo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams

la slob bo// 'jigs pa rnams la slob bo// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob bo// byams pa chen po la slob bo// snying rje chen po la slob bo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob bo// rgyun tu zhugs

pa'i 'bras bu la slob bo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo// phyid 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo// dgra bcom pa nyid la slob bo// rang byang chub la slob bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob bo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid la slob bo// lha'i bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang 'bral bar spyod pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ste/ lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe/ nga de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi zham 'bring byed cing / rgyal po'i khab pad+mo yod pa'i nang gi tshong dus kyi dbus na 'dug pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha tu pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu

pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// phyi stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// phyi nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// chen po stong pa nyid dang bral bar

ma gyur to// don dam pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// thog ma dang

tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur

to// pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// dran pa nye bar gzhag

pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// dbang po rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// stobs rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams

dang bral bar ma gyur to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// bsam gtan rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// tshad pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// gzugs

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// rnam par thar pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang /

smon pa pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// mngon par shes pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang bral bar

ma gyur to// 'jigs pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// byams pa chen po dang bral bar ma gyur to// snying rje chen po dang bral bar ma gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams

dang yang bral bar ma gyur te/ de pa'i tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag dang yang bral bar ma gyur to// lha'i bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

mar me mdzad kyis nga la khye'u khyod ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs pa na/ bskal pa bzang po'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

mkhyen pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i/ kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de ltar gzugs len 'dor ba'i

tshul dang / tshor ba len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du byed len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba len
'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzugs len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sgra len 'dor ba'i

tshul dang / dri len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ro len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / reg len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chos len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gi rnam par shes pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par

shes pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa len

'dor ba'i tshul dang / gi 'dus te reg pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus

kyi 'dus te reg pa mi len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba lan 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba len 'dor ba'i tshul

dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sa'i khams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chu'i khams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / khams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / nam

mkha'i khams mi len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ma rig pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du byed len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang /

dang gzugs len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye mched drug len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / reg pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor ba len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sred pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / len pa len 'dor

ba'i tshul dang / srid pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye ba len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rga shi len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa len

'dor ba'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa len

'dor ba'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid

len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid

len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid len

'dor ba'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / pa stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid len

'dor ba'i tshul dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams

len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / stobs rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa len 'dor ba'i
tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bsam gtan rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshad pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams len 'dor

ba'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa len

'dor ba'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams len 'dor

ba'i tshul dang / 'jigs pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / byams pa chen po len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sangs

rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / thams cad shes pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshuld gyis/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthun par yongs su 'dzin pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i

'khor bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu dang / mtshe ma'i lha'i bu dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 'phrul

dga'i lha'i bu dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs chen gyi lha'i bu dang / snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung snang gi lha'i bu dang /

tshad snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung dge'i lha'i bu dang / tshad dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu dang / che ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung che'i lha'i bu dang / tshad che ba'i lha'i bu

dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu dang / che ba'i lha'i bu dang / gdung ba'i lha'i bu dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i bu dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'og gyi lha'i bu de dag 'dus shing tshogs par mkhyen nas/ de dag thams cad

dpang du btsugs te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo

'am/ lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang / 'bral ba de dag ni/ bdud sdig can dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ gzugs

stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du shes stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes

pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags r+ny+hed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags r+ny+hed do// smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags r+ny+hed

do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/

lce stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags r+ny+hed/

mtshan ma pas/ mtshan ma pa la glags r+ny+hed/ smon pa pas/ smon pa pa la glags r+ny+hed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/

sgra stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dri stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ro stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ reg stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chos stong pa nyid

shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags r+ny+hed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags r+ny+hed/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags r+ny+hed do//

de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i rnam

par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong

pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags r+ny+hed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags r+ny+hed/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags r+ny+hed

do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i 'dus te

reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid

shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags r+ny+hed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags r+ny+hed do/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags r+ny+hed do// de ni 'di ltar

rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs

par 'gyur/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags rnyed/

smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/

khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid

shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags rnyed/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ni

'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par

'gyur/ dang gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin

gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sred pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ len pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ srid pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye ba stong pa nyid

shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rga shi stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags rnyed/ smon pa

pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis

brlabs par 'gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu

byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la

glags rnyed/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis

brlabs par 'gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/

don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/

rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/

pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dngos

po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags rnyed/ smon pa pas

smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis

brlabs par 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dbang po rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ stobs rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/

byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis

stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams

stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bsam gtan rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshad pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa

nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la

glags rnyed/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'jigs

pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ byams pa chen po stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ snying rje chen po stong pa nyid shin tu

byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la

glags rnyed/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ thams cad shes pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa

nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma

pa la glags rnyed/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang du glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang la glags rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag gi

ngo bo nyid do// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni / ma yin pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba de dag gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag

gis de pa'i tshul gyis/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nyam nga ba spongs bas dus byed par

yang 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gis/ sems can thams cad la yang dag par spang bas bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir

ro// kau shi ka gang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi khams na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi

lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / lha'i bu gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

'di ma thos pa dang / ma bzung ba dang / ma bcangs pa dang / kun chub par ma byas pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul

bzhin du yid la bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang yang ma bral bar bya'o// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing / 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed

pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang yang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung / bla gab pa na 'dug kyang rung / lam gol ba na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'jigs pa'am/

sngang bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nang stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// phyi stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// phyi

nang stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// chen po stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// don dam pa stong pa nyid de
pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa

nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// rang bzhin stong pa
nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// pa

stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// dngos po pa'i ngo

bo nyid stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi

lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad

kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /

kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / gzhan la 'ang rgya cher ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yid la bgyi ba dang / 'bral ba de dag la rtag tu rgyun 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par

bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ sems can dmyal ba rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten

rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ lha las phongs pa rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ las dbul ba rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ nad dang gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad cing 'jig pa dang / ma mchis par 'gyur/

mu ge'i zhugs ngam thams cad kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshad

pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa 'jig

rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus

ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar

'gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung

bar 'gyur/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi

'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dbang po lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ stobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/

byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'jig rten
du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig rten du

'byung bar 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi

'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ thams cad shes pa nyid

'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ rgyal rigs che

zhing mtho ba mchis par 'gyur/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba mchis par 'gyur/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba mchis pa 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams mchis par 'gyur/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
rnams mchis par 'gyur/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ gzhan

'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs chen gyi lha

rnams mchis par 'gyur/ snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ chung snang gi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshad snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dge ba'i lha rnams

mchis par 'gyur/ chung dge'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshad dge ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ chung che'i lha rnams mchis par

'gyur/ tshad che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ gdung ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams mchis par

'gyur/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 'og gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ rgyun tu zhugs pa

mchis par 'gyur/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba mchis par 'gyur/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ phyir 'ong ba mchis par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa nyid mchis

par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa mchis par 'gyur/ rang byang chub mchis par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ sems can yongs su smyin pa mchis par 'gyur/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mchis par 'gyur/ 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mchis par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas
dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na lha dang dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi ka de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin

te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// lha

las phongs pa rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// las dbul ba rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad rgyun 'chad pa dang / 'jig pa dang / par 'gyur ro// mu ge'i mya ngam thams cad

rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad pa bzhi 'jig rten du

'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung

bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur

ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba pa stong pa nyid

'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//

pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du

'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga 'jig

rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags
pa'i bden pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam

par thar pa'i sgo gsum 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du

'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung

bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba yod par 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba yod par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs che

zhing mtho ba yod par 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams yod par 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod par

'gyur ro// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// tshangs lha nye phan gyi

lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// snang ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// chung snang gi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// tshad snang ba'i

lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// chung dge'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// dge rgyas kyi lha

rnams yod par 'gyur ro// che ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// chung che'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// che ba'i lha rnams

yod par 'gyur ro// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// 'og gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po yod na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa yod par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i

'bras bu yod par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba yod par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid yod par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa yod par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub yod par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas yod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ sems can yongs su smyin pa yod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge 'dun dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de

bas na lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o/ bkur stir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rtag tu rgyun 'chad par de la bsrung pa

dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya'o// kau shi ka gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems pa de ni/ nga la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur

stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems so// de bas na lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu

dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rtag tu rgyun 'chad par de la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya'o// kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam

bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ rtsi skyang gi tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis gang bar gyur la/ de dag la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis nam

'tsho'i bar du yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/ gang la las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa/ pha rol tu phyin

pa drug dang ma bral ba zhig la rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag yod pas/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po yod na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka de bas na lha dang /

dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rtag tu rgyun 'chad par de la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang /
bskyab par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu drug go// // shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa// de nas

lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub

par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag gis tshe 'di la 'thob pa'i yon tan 'di dag yongs su zin par 'gyur zhing / sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa

dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bgyi ba dang /

bkur stir bgyi ba dang / phu dud du bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de dag kyang bla na pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du dran pa mi nyams pa dang rigs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su

'dzin pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 'od phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / dbyangs phun sum

tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang // ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par sprul cing / 'jig

rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su mchi ba dang / gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams skye zhing byung bar ma gyur pa de dang de dag tu mchis shing / sbyin pa'i pha tu pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu

pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang /

don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid

kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang /

pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i yon tan

rjod pa dang / tshad pa bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'i yon tan rjod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / yang

dag par spong ba bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / dbang po lnga'i yon tan rjod pa dang / stobs lnga'i yon tan rjod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi yon tan rjod pa dang / 'phags pa'i

lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i yon tan rjod pa dang / rnam

par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan

rjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan rjod pa dang / 'jigs pa bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / byams pa chen po'i yon tan rjod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i yon tan

rjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /

theg pa gsum la 'dul ba ni ngo mtshar che'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams

cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba

dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang /

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su bzung

bar 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su

bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba

rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams

yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / tshad

pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin

rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'jigs pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang /

so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / byams pa chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su

bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid yongs

su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba yang / ngo mtshar che'o// de

skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad

yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// chen po

stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa

stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams

cad stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong

pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro//
