bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba'i/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/ me tog sna tshogs can/ 'bras bu sna tshogs can/ dbyibs sna tshogs

can/ chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang / de dag gi grib ma la khyad par ram/ bye brag te/ gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar zad do// kau shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la yang khyad par ram/ bye brag so// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan

thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du/ yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du/ tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o//
bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du/ yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la

zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / glegs bam du bgyis te/ bcangs pa dang / tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /

ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gong du ji skad du bstan pa bzhin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis
pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te/ gzhan stsal na/ de gnyis las gang gis bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas na khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la/

me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod pa

byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te/ bgo bshar byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po de blangs te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror byas/ bkur stir

byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/

rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bgyis

bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa bas/ gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan stsal na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang / don de nyid gzigs te/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/ sems can gyi ris na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis/ 'dul

ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du/ thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so// bcom ldan 'das gang la las/ chung ngu na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la

mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ kau

shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal

mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa bas/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ chos kyi dga' bas gzhan byin na/ rigs

kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gzhan gyi drung du song ste/ bshad cing

bstan pa dang / brjod cing bkrol ba dang / rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas/ bsod nams cher 'phel te/ de ni ston pa yin par bsam mo//

bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa ni gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhan

zhes bya ba kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa/ ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da

ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon

par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang / phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na de/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing / bla na pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing / nyan thos

kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po// 'thob bo//

thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs

par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / byang chub

sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs so 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur

ro// kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na

bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon du rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang / phu dud du bya bar 'dod pa dang mchod par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o//

mchod par bya'o// kau shi ka ngas don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di snyam ste/ gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang /

phu dud dang / mchod pa bya ste/ brten cing rnam par spyad par bya snyam na/ kau shi ka de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / dang lha dang lha

ma yin du bcas pa'i nang nang dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/ de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de ltar yin na bdag gis chos zhi ba bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis/ mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la/

rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bya ste/ brten cing rnam par spyod par bya'o// snyam du bsams so// kau shi ka chos de 'di gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/ kau shi ka

de ltar nga nyid kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed de/ de ltar rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas shing rnam par spyod na/ kau

shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bya

ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i

rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na

bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung ba ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so// kau shi ka de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ nyan thos kyi

theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal

mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag ni/ bla na pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob po// 'thob bo//

thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob po// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu

gnyis so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las

kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus/ de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam klag pa 'am/ bri ba'am/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir/ gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de

ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa pa'i chos gang la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo slob cing / yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / rgyun

tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob

pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob

par 'gyur ba dang / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bla na pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos rgya cher

bstan pa de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa

nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /

pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang

pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / 'di dag ni

zag pa pa'i chos te/ de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgya cher bstan to// de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par

sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka sems can gcig cig rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod

nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni/ sems can

dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba ma yin no// kau shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i

'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ci smos/ kau shi ka gang la las 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams/ rgyun tu

zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas/ la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig rang byang chub

la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu

'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun

'chad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/

rigs kyi bu mo gzhan la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun 'chad
pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs

kyi bu mo gzhan la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don du zhugs

pa'i phyir ro// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan la la zhig gis sems can

gcig cig bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun 'chad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro// kau shi ka rigs

kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la

bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gcig po bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so// kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/

bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna

tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi

lam la bkod par gyur na/ kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang

ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam bri ba 'am/ klag pa 'am/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/

bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon

par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur
ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang

sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta

ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang

stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong

pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po

pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub

kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma

pa dang smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas

kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi

bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de ni bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau

shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yang

do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtsho ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams

yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad

snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha

rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom

snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du

shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don

dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin

stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo

nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa

brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs

kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu

zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus

mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa pa'i chos

rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//

'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid

thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang
byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang / gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /

don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /

chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag

pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par

thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo

thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po

dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las

chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams

yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod

do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun

snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad

che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams

yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha tu

pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus

ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod

do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod

do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//

de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
rnams lta zhog gi// kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can/ ji snyed cig yod pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi

ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to//

'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong

ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob
par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon

par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang / gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /

phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid

dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa

nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang

chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo

stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so

so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag

kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas

'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams

yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//

dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha

rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung

dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams

yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha

rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do//

phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das

pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong

pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag bar spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do//

tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do//

so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod

do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba

rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
yod do// // shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu bdun pa/ kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams

'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel

lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs

bam bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher
bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//

'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//

'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon

par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya

bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang / gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /

'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa

nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong

ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad

pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon

pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau

shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas de'i bsod nams

ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyas rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//

bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams

yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha

rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung

dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//

che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//

rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do//

phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa

nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag

par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i
bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong
ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu
zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod

do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka stong gnyis pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi

khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du

'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa 'di'i glegs bam bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa

pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob

par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra
bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs

par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /

chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid

dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo

nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam

yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang /

mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres

pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs

kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de

ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim

bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams

yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams

yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas

kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu

mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//

pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid

yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid
yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po

pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//
dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad
pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma med pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do/

so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras

bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir

'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

rnams yod do// kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab

tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu' ma/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel

lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par
zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par

'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang
chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur

ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag

kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong

pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /

pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi

dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms

chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag

pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad

rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//

sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//

tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//

kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung

che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha
rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes

'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong

pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong

pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo

nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa

brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod

do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las

bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i

bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa

pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//

'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid

thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /

byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid

dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong

pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /

dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags

pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge

'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa

chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/

rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//

khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i

lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha nams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod

do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad

dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams

yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes
mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha

rol tu pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi

stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong

pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag

par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis

gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun

tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka gling

chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon

par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod

nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang

dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob
bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug

par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa

pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus

byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par

spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad

dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo

thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /

dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang / rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs

bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las

chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod

do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams

yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod

do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha

rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha
rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod
do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha tu pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//

chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do//

dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo

bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs
rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do//
mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//

snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang

byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod

do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig

rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa

dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/

de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par

'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo//

thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon

par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
