rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid

dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad

stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang

dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar

pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi

sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /

dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di

ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing

mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//

gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i

lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha

rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes
mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha tu pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi

stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid

stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do//
yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar
kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//
gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid

yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// //
